Package org.lantern.state

Interface Summary
ModelService Interface for settings that are mutable.
SyncStrategy Interface for supporting various methods of syncing with clients using some form of server-side push.
 

Class Summary
CometDSyncStrategy Strategy for syncing/pushing with the browser using cometd.
CometDSyncStrategy.SyncData Helper class that formats data according to: https://github.com/getlantern/lantern-ui/blob/master/SPECS.md
Connectivity Class representing data about Lantern's connectivity.
DefaultModelService Class that does the dirty work of executing changes to the various settings users can configure.
InternalState  
JsonModelModifier Class that uses reflection to set properties on the state model.
Location Location data for the client.
Model State model of the application for the UI to display.
Model.Persistent  
Model.Run  
ModelIo  
ModelUtils Utility methods that rely on the existence of the state model class.
Peer Class containing data for an individual peer, including active connections, IP address, etc.
Profile  
Settings Base Lantern settings.
StaticSettings  
SwtJavaScriptSyncStrategy Strategy for syncing/pushing with the browser using direct calls to JavaScript from the SWT browser widget.
SyncService Service for pushing updated Lantern state to the client.
SystemData Class containing data about the users system.
Transfers Class representing all uploads and downloads data.
Version Class containing version data for clients.
 

Enum Summary
Modal The state for the modal dialog.
Settings.Mode  
SyncPath The available channels to sync on.
